特記事項:
2023 年度まで開講の「Skills-based English(TOEFL)L2」との重複履修は不可。
この授業を履修するには、事前にレベル認定の申請が必要です。詳細は備考欄を確認してください。
授業方法:
General course format:
This is NOT a lecture class. Lessons are highly student-centered involving individual, pair, and group work. Students are expected to actively contribute to the class, as well as complete their assignments in a timely manner before each class. This course will be taught in English only, and students are expected to use English as much as possible.

第1回: Week 1: Introductions and course overview, Diagnostic test
第2回: Week 2: Listening skills overview and practice: Main idea questions
第3回: Week 3: Listening skills practice: Detail questions
第4回: Week 4: Listening skills practice: function questions
第5回: Week 5: Listening skills practice: stance  and organization questions
第6回: Week 6: Listening skills practice: content questions
第7回: Week 7: Listening skills practice: inference questions
第9回: Week 9: Speaking skills overview and practice: Independent tasks
第10回: Week 10: Speaking skills practice: independent tasks
第11回: Week 11: Speaking skills practice: Integrated tasks
第12回: Week 12: Speaking skills practice: Integrated tasks
トピック.授業計画1: Please note that the weekly schedule above is for information purposes and may change throughout the semester. Any change will be announced to students in due time.
トピック.授業外学習2: Review each lesson and complete the regular homework assignments in order to be prepared for the following class.  This should take approximately two hours per class lesson.

成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.
成績評価Grading1: 30% class participation; 40% homework; 30% Practice tests and quizzes
